text: Āllāhara pratiśrauti ārau mānuhara pratiśrautira bāhiraē siham̐taka ya’tē'i pōraā gaichē tatē'i siham̐ta lāñchita haichē. Ārau siham̐ta āllāhara kraōdhara pātra haichē lagatē siham̐tara ōparata daraidra nirdhāraṇa karai diẏā haichē; ē'iṭō ē'i bābē yē, siham̐ta āllāhara āẏātasamūhara lagata kupharaī karaichila ārau an'yāẏabhāraē nabīsakalaka hatyā karaichila; sēẏā ē'i bābē yē, siham̐ta abādhya haichila ārau sīmālaṅghana karaichila
